ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Your chronosphere will last longer with scepter. That means you have more time to kill enemies in chronosphere.
ItemTooltips.rapier: Just a Divine Rapier. I hope you know how to use that.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Your attacks will be much faster. Useful for quickly killing enemies in chronosphere.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: This is awesome to quickly kill enemies trapped in chronosphere.
ItemTooltips.bfury: With this you can hurt multiple enemies in chronosphere.
ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness: Bigger lifesteal, jungle awaits. Also this is useful for quick killing enemies in chronosphere!

AbilityTooltips.faceless_void_time_walk: This is for escaping or catching up on an enemy.
AbilityTooltips.faceless_void_chronosphere: This is what makes Faceless Void probably the hardest carry in the game.
